title: Take a look at Hailey Baldwin’s stunning wedding dress in all its glory
text:
Newlyweds Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin are still very much in wedding mode with Hailey finally sharing some pics of her gown and they are stunning!

More than a year after getting hitched secretly at a New York City courthouse, Justin and Hailey threw a lavish traditional wedding reception at the Montage Palmetto Bluff in South Carolina on September 30, according to People.

Hailey walked down the aisle in a lace off-the-shoulder, long-sleeve off-white wedding dress with mermaid-style skirt and long, sheer veil that featured designer Virgil Abhol’s signature block lettering.

A week after tying the knot again, Hailey shared a new photo on her Instagram account embracing and kissing her new hubby, who looks dapper in a tux, with the veil trailing behind her featuring the words ‘Till Death Do Us Part’ lining the end of it.

‘Last Monday was the most special day of my life,’ the 22-year-old wrote.

In a second photo, the American model shared a solo portrait of herself standing in front of a house with hair styled in a low bun parted in the centre and a natural makeup look.

She captioned the photo: ‘@virgilabloh thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress. You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation.’

During the reception, Hailey slipped into a white halter dress which she accessorised with an embroidered Celine leather jacket featuring the word, ‘Wife’ printed across the back.

Justin and Hailey married at Somerset Chapel in front of a star studded guest list of over 150, including Kendall Jenner, Kylie Jenner with daughter Stormi, Jaden Smith, Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble, as well as Bieber’s manager Scooter Braun.

Too gorgeous (Picture: Instagram)

Also in attendance on the big day were Dan Smyers and Shay Mooney of country duo Dan + Shay – who the Canadian singer recently released a single with, which he called ‘wedding music’ – and their wives Abby and Hannah.

The 25-year-old previously shared snaps from the ceremony of him and his wife looking loved up, as he said he was ‘looking forward to forever with her’.

The couple have been very happy to flaunt their loved up status, posing for some steamy shots for a Calvin Klein campaign to celebrate 50 years of the brand.

Justin’s mum has also shared her happiness for the two, gushing about how ‘beautiful’ Hailey is and how her ‘heart is full’.

I mean same.

‘You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT,’ she wrote. ‘I don’t think I could have picked a better match for you. You are a gift to each other.
